title: Fluency & Coherence
description: Master the art of speaking naturally and organizing your ideas logically.

title: Pronunciation & Intonation
description: Learn how to pronounce words clearly and use natural stress patterns.

title: Lexical Resource in Speaking
description: Expand your vocabulary and use words appropriately in context.

title: Grammatical Range & Accuracy
description: Use complex grammar structures correctly in your speaking.

title: Part 2 Cue Card Mastery
description: Develop strategies to speak for 2 minutes on any topic.

title: Task Achievement in Writing
description: Learn to fully address all parts of the writing task.

title: Coherence & Cohesion in Writing
description: Organize your writing with clear paragraphs and linking devices.

title: Lexical Resource in Writing
description: Use a wide range of vocabulary accurately in your essays.

title: Grammatical Range in Writing
description: Master complex sentence structures for higher band scores.

title: Task 2 Essay Types
description: Understand different essay types: opinion discussion problem-solution.

title: Listening for Specific Information
description: Develop skills to catch names numbers dates and specific details.

title: Understanding Main Ideas
description: Learn to identify the main point and purpose of conversations.

title: Following Directions & Maps
description: Master the vocabulary and skills for map labeling questions.

title: Note Completion Strategies
description: Learn techniques for completing notes forms and tables.

title: Multiple Choice Techniques
description: Develop strategies for multiple choice listening questions.

title: Skimming for Main Ideas
description: Learn to quickly identify the main idea of passages.

title: Scanning for Details
description: Develop the ability to locate specific information quickly.

title: True/False/Not Given Strategies
description: Master the logic behind these challenging question types.

title: Matching Headings
description: Learn to match paragraph headings with main ideas effectively.

title: Summary & Sentence Completion
description: Develop skills for completing summaries and sentences accurately.
